stimulusHtml:
Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes.

Write an essay that:

  • Has a relevant thesis.

  • Addresses all parts of the question.

  • Supports thesis with specific evidence.

  • Is well organized.

Compare and contrast how TWO of the following states attempted to hold together their empires in the period circa 1850 to 1914.

Austria-Hungary

Russia

Ottoman Empire
